attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the prime minister to take action on the following.
    to make sure that the murder sentence is for life (until the murderer dies in jail) or until  new evidence is forthcoming.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
